comment: This is the control file for the SWE_2D case. It contains the control variables and options.

control_variables.comment: Choose what to perform: forward simulation, inversion, sensitivity analysis, or UDE. Only one of them can be true.

time_settings.comment: Time settings for the simulation (overrides the srhhydro file)

UDE_options.comment_UDE_choice: Choice for UDE: ManningN_h, FlowResistance. For ManningN_h, a NN is used to fit ManningN as a function of water depth h. For FlowResistance, a NN is used to fit the flow resistance term (tau_b) as a function of h, u, and v.
UDE_options.comment_how_to_initialize_NN: random, from_pretrained (for inference or continued training; file name must be provided as NN_weights_state_file_name)
UDE_options.comment_UDE_optimizers: Optimizers for the UDE training: A list with the order of the optimizers for the UDE training
UDE_options.comment_UDE_learning_rates: Learning rates for the UDE training: A list with the order of the learning rates for the UDE training
UDE_options.comment_UDE_max_iterations: Maximum number of epochs/iterations for the optimizer: A list with the order of the maximum number of epochs/iterations for the optimizer

UDE_ode_solver_options.comment: Options for the ode solver in the forward pass
